title: Introducing: Oyinda
body:
Having dropped her debut track last month, the piano driven flutter of _Rush of You_, London-Nigerian singer/songwriter/producer **Oyinda** has unveiled her stunning second offering, _What Still Remains_, and it’s a more than worthy follow-up.

Smoother and more refined than her debut, it’s emotionally fraught lyrics are backed up by some of the impressive production of the year. This is a seriously impressive song. Check out both tracks below, and keep up with Oyinda on [Facebook](facebook.com/oyinda).
